modelIdentification.name: Real-time Platform Reference Physical FOM Module
modelIdentification.purpose: The RPR FOM supports interoperability for real-time, platform oriented defense simulation.
modelIdentification.description: This module provides object class definitions for representing physical entities including aircraft, ground vehicles, ships, life forms, ammunition, etc. In addition it provides interaction classes to signal collisions between physical entities.
modelIdentification.useHistory: draft 19.0 Release Notes - The RPR Physical FOM Module was derived from RPR-FOM v2.0 D17, based on NETN RPR2 Physical FOM Module v1.0.1r2.

draft 19.2 Release Notes - Changed data type for PropulsionSystemDataStruct.PowerSetting from PowerSetting_Enum32 to Float32. - Removed data type PowerSetting_Enum32. - Changed update type for PhysicalEntity.Marking from Static to Conditional (On change). - Changed occurrences of "N/A" to "NA". - Spelling corrections (US English).
draft 19.3 Release Notes - Apply data type RPR-FOM Naming Convention.
draft 19.4 Release Notes - Changed representation for all enumerations ...Enum32 to RPRunsignedInteger32BE.
draft 19.5 Release Notes - Deleted note rpr2physical_12.

draft 19.6 Release Notes: - Removed nodes basicDataRepresentations and variantRecordDataTypes (no such datatypes defined in this module). - Moved notes from the name to attribute/parameter/type level. - Alphabetical sort of the datatypes.
draft 19.7 Release Notes: - Move all Enumerated data types either to the SISO-REF-010 Enumerations FOM module or to the RPR Enumerations FOM module.

draft 19.10 Release Notes: - Updated model identification, including purpose, application domain, POC, and references. - Updated semantics, starting with reverting to semantics from v2D17. - Updated note labels according to RPR-FOM Naming Convention.

reference.identification: Real-time Platform Reference Base FOM Module
Guidance, Rationale, and Interoperability Manual for the Real-time Platform Reference Federation Object Model (RPR FOM) SISO-STD-001.1-2013 (ToDo: list official GRIM date)
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1-1995 September 21, 1995
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1a-1998 19 March 1998

objectClass.name: PhysicalEntity
objectClass.semantics: A base class of all discrete platform scenario domain participants.

attribute.name: AcousticSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the acoustics (sound through air) signature state of the entity.

attribute.name: AlternateEntityType
attribute.semantics: The category of entity to be used when viewed by entities on the 'opposite' side.

attribute.name: ArticulatedParametersArray
attribute.semantics: Identification of the visible parts, and their states, of the entity which are capable of independent motion.

attribute.name: CamouflageType
attribute.semantics: The type of camouflage in use (if any).

attribute.name: DamageState
attribute.semantics: The state of damage of the entity.

attribute.name: EngineSmokeOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's engine is generating smoke or not.

attribute.name: FirePowerDisabled
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's main weapon system has been disabled or not.

attribute.name: FlamesPresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is on fire (with visible flames) or not.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the force that the entity belongs to.

attribute.name: HasAmmunitionSupplyCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to supply other entities with ammunition.

attribute.name: HasFuelSupplyCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to supply other entities with fuel or not.

attribute.name: HasRecoveryCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to recover other entities or not.

attribute.name: HasRepairCap
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has the capability to repair other entities or not.

attribute.name: Immobilized
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is immobilized or not.

attribute.name: InfraredSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the infra-red signature state of the entity.

attribute.name: IsConcealed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is concealed or not.

attribute.name: LiveEntityMeasuredSpeed
attribute.semantics: The entity's own measurement of speed (e.g. air speed for aircraft).

attribute.name: Marking
attribute.semantics: A unique marking or combination of characters used to distinguish the entity from other entities.

attribute.name: PowerPlantOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's power plant is on or not.

attribute.name: PropulsionSystemsData
attribute.semantics: The basic operating data of the propulsion systems aboard the entity.

attribute.name: RadarCrossSectionSignatureIndex
attribute.semantics: Index used to obtain the radar cross section signature state of the entity.

attribute.name: SmokePlumePresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity is generating smoke or not (intentional or unintentional).

attribute.name: TentDeployed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has deployed tent or not.

attribute.name: TrailingEffectsCode
attribute.semantics: The type and size of any trail that the entity is making.

attribute.name: VectoringNozzleSystemData
attribute.semantics: The basic operational data for the vectoring nozzle systems aboard the entity.

objectClass.name: Platform
objectClass.semantics: A physical object under the control of armed forces upon which sensor, communication, or weapon systems may be mounted.

attribute.name: AfterburnerOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's afterburner is on or not.

attribute.name: AntiCollisionLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's anti-collision lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BlackOutBrakeLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's black out brake lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BlackOutLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's black out lights are on or not.

attribute.name: BrakeLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's brake lights are on or not.

attribute.name: FormationLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's formation lights are on or not.

attribute.name: HatchState
attribute.semantics: The state of the entity's (main) hatch.

attribute.name: HeadLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's headlights are on or not.

attribute.notes: RPRnotePhysical3 RPRnotePhysical10 RPRnotePhysical11 RPRnotePhysical12 RPRnotePhysical13 RPRnotePhysical15
attribute.name: InteriorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's internal lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LandingLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's landing lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LauncherRaised
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's weapon launcher is in the raised position.

attribute.name: NavigationLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's navigation lights are on or not.

attribute.name: RampDeployed
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity has deployed a ramp or not.

attribute.name: RunningLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's running lights are on or not.

attribute.notes: RPRnotePhysical3 RPRnotePhysical10 RPRnotePhysical11 RPRnotePhysical12 RPRnotePhysical13 RPRnotePhysical15
attribute.name: SpotLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's spotlights are on or not.

attribute.name: TailLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the entity's tail lights are on or not.

objectClass.name: Aircraft
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates mainly in the air, such as aircraft, balloons, etc. This includes the entities when they are on the ground.

objectClass.name: AmphibiousVehicle
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that can operate both on the land and the sea.

objectClass.name: GroundVehicle
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates wholly on the surface of the earth.

objectClass.name: MultiDomainPlatform
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates in more than one domain (excluding those combinations explicitly defined as subclasses of the superclass of this class).

objectClass.name: Spacecraft
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates mainly in space.

objectClass.name: SubmersibleVessel
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates either on the surface of the sea, or beneath it.

objectClass.name: SurfaceVessel
objectClass.semantics: A platform entity that operates wholly on the surface of the sea.

objectClass.name: Lifeform
objectClass.semantics: A living military platform (human or not).

attribute.name: FlashLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the lifeform's flash lights are on or not.

attribute.name: StanceCode
attribute.semantics: The stance of the lifeform.

attribute.name: PrimaryWeaponState
attribute.semantics: The state of the soldier's primary weapon system.

attribute.name: SecondaryWeaponState
attribute.semantics: The state of the soldier's secondary weapon system.

attribute.name: ComplianceState
attribute.semantics: The compliance of the lifeform.

objectClass.name: NonHuman
objectClass.semantics: An animal or other non-human lifeform.

objectClass.name: CulturalFeature
objectClass.semantics: Engineering and natural effects such as craters, bridges, vehicle tracks, etc.

attribute.name: ExternalLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's external lights are on or not.

attribute.name: InternalHeatSourceOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's internal heat source is on or not.

attribute.name: InternalLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the cultural feature's internal lights are on or not.

objectClass.name: Munition
objectClass.semantics: A complete device charged with explosives, propellants, pyrotechnics, initiating composition, or nuclear, biological or chemical material for use in military operations, including demolitions.

attribute.name: LauncherFlashPresent
attribute.semantics: Whether the flash of the munition being launched is present or not.

objectClass.name: Expendables
objectClass.semantics: Countermeasures devices that are dispensed from another entity. The devices may be active emitters or passive reflectors of energy.

objectClass.name: Radio
objectClass.semantics: Electronic devices for the communication of both audio and data, operated by entities belonging to armed forces.

objectClass.name: Sensor
objectClass.semantics: Sensors and emitters, such as stand-alone radars, jammers, and detection systems, that are not part of another platform or system described by another Physical Entity, and are operated by armed forces.

attribute.name: AntennaRaised
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's antenna is raised or not.

attribute.name: BlackoutLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's blackout lights are on or not.

attribute.name: LightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's lights are on or not.

attribute.name: InteriorLightsOn
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter's interior lights are on or not.

attribute.name: MissionKill
attribute.semantics: Whether the sensor/emitter has sustained damage that will prevent it carrying out its mission or not (e.g. damaged antenna).

objectClass.name: Supplies
objectClass.semantics: Supplies other than munitions, such as fuel, food and personnel.

interactionClass.name: Collision
interactionClass.semantics: The act or instance of coming together with solid impact.

parameter.name: CollidingObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the object that the issuing object has collided with.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectMass
parameter.semantics: The mass of the issuing object.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectVelocityVector
parameter.semantics: The velocity vector of the issuing object at the moment of impact.

parameter.name: CollisionLocation
parameter.semantics: The location of the collision relative to the object that the issuing object has collided with.

parameter.name: EventIdentifier
parameter.semantics: An ID assigned by the issuing object to associate related collision events.

parameter.name: IssuingObjectIdentifier
parameter.semantics: The object instance ID of the object that has detected the collision and issued the collision interaction.

interactionClass.name: CollisionElastic
interactionClass.semantics: The act or instance of coming together with solid impact in an elastic manner. An elastic collision allows a higher fidelity collision to be modeled, taking into account linear and rotational momentum transfer, variable elasticity, and momentum transfer that is dependent on surface orientation.

parameter.name: CoefficientOfRestitution
parameter.semantics: The degree that energy is conserved in a collision.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXX
parameter.semantics: X-X Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXY
parameter.semantics: X-Y Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultXZ
parameter.semantics: X-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultYY
parameter.semantics: Y-Y Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultYZ
parameter.semantics: Y-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: IntermediateResultZZ
parameter.semantics: Z-Z Component of the positive semi-definite Collision Intermediate Result matrix.

parameter.name: UnitSurfaceNormal
parameter.semantics: The normal vector to the surface at the point of collision detection.

simpleData.name: RevolutionsPerMinuteFloat32
simpleData.semantics: Rotation speed expressed in revolutions per minute.

simpleData.name: VelocityDecimeterPerSecondInteger16
simpleData.semantics: Velocity/Speed measured in decimeter per second.

arrayData.name: MarkingArray11
arrayData.semantics: String of characters represented by an 11 element character string.

arrayData.name: PropulsionSystemDataStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: A set of Propulsion System Data descriptions.

arrayData.name: VectoringNozzleSystemDataStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: A set of Vectoring Nozzle System Data description.

fixedRecordData.name: EntityCoordinateVectorStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Vector in the entity coordinate system. Based on the Entity Coordinate Vector record as specified in IEEE 1278.1-1995 section 5.2.33a.

fixedRecordData.name: MarkingStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Character set used in the marking and the string of characters to be interpreted for display.

fixedRecordData.name: PropulsionSystemDataStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Information describing a propulsion system in terms of power settings and current RPM.

field.name: PowerSetting
field.semantics: The power setting of the propulsion system, after any response lags have been incorporated.

fixedRecordData.name: VectoringNozzleSystemDataStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Operational data for describing the vectoring nozzle systems being simulated.

field.name: HorizontalDeflectionAngle
field.semantics: The nozzle deflection angle in the horizontal body axis of the entity.

field.name: VerticalDeflectionAngle
field.semantics: The nozzle deflection angle in the vertical body axis of the entity.

note.label: RPRnotePhysical16
note.semantics: If there is no object instance associated with the attribute, then this should be set to the empty string (no characters).

note.label: RPRnotePhysical17
note.semantics: This must reference a valid object instance.

note.label: RPRnotePhysical18
note.semantics: The units and semantics for the MarkingData array elements are specified by the value of the MarkingEncodingType.
